title: Isekai De Rippa Na Inu Ni Naru Houhou - Novel Updates
author: Hino Kiiro   日野きいろ
description:
A story about the hero trying to take back his human body after waking up and discovering that he’s turned into a puppy.

With the owner stroking my head while I swing my tail back and forth, living my life as a dog is quite fun.>
